txt.en: You have spoken with Munfaeril about Madin Brenin
Talk to Munfaeril at her shrine
Collected Munfaeril's sigil
Placed Munfaeril's sigil on the shrine
You have found a placard upon Munfaeril's shrine that describes the ritual of the Dunlending Derudh to call upon the ox-spirit Munfaeril for aid.

This placard describes the ritual used by the Derudh of Dunland to call upon the ox-spirit Munfaeril, which they call the Uch-gwirod, for aid. The troubles in Barnavon may be cause enough to attempt such a feat.\n\nThe placard demands the use of a sigil, which you do not possess. Perhaps one of the foes wandering Carreglyn may have one in its possession....
Warg-riders and Ox-clan warriors wander the landscape of Carreglyn.\n\nPerhaps one of the Warg-riders or Ox-clan warriors came upon the shrine and stole Munfaeril's sigil.

'I am pleased that you have heard my summons, good [placeholder]. Does it surprise you that your coming is of my design? I care very much for the People of the Ox, but Madin Brenin has fallen to corruption. He and his people oppress the remnant of the Turch-l√ªth, the People of the Boar, and plot war with the Horse-lords who are in the favour of the Valar. This cannot be tolerated.

'I ask that you go to Barnavon and bring this message to Madin Brenin: if he does not turn from his evil ways, he and his people will feel the wrath of the Uch-gwirod and the Huntsman.

'Take my sigil as proof of my words and speak with me when you are ready to depart.'
Munfaeril's shrine lies to the north of Barnavon.\n\nYou should place Munfaeril's sigil upon her shrine and perform the ritual to call upon her aid.
Munfaeril is at her shrine, north of Barnavon.\n\nYou should speak with Munfaeril through the shrine regarding the evils committed by the brenin of Barnavon.
'Very well, [placeholder]. May your quest be fruitful.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This instance is intended to be run solo, but can be run duo as well.</rgb>

'Alas, Madin Brenin was a fool, and his son no less. Yet, the true blame for these evils falls to one of my own kindred, and I fear they will all suffer in the end.\n\n'I thank you for bringing my warning to Barnavon and grant you what grace I may.'

Munfaeril is at her shrine, north of Barnavon.

You should speak with Munfaeril when you are ready to depart for Barnavon.

<rgb=#FF0000>This instance is intended to be run solo, but can be run duo as well.</rgb>
Munfaeril is at her shrine, north of Barnavon.\n\nYou should return to Munfaeril and tell her of the events at Barnavon.
Collect Munfaeril's sigil
Place Munfaeril's sigil on the shrine
Talk to Munfaeril at her shrine
Let Munfaeril know when you are ready to depart for Barnavon. <rgb=#FF0000>You may summon her through the shrine if necessary</rgb>
Munfaeril's Warning
Talk to Munfaeril through her shrine
